InstalledItem.Name: M6A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 4

Behring's M6A is a versatile high velocity energy autocannon, designed to provide to keep your enemy at range without sacrificing your stopping power.

InstalledItem.Name: Remote Turret
InstalledItem.Description: Remote Turret

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S4 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 4

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon the same size as the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-447 Rhino Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 4

When a ship comes charging at you with a CF-447 Rhino strapped on, it is an experience few pilots will ever forget. This formidable size four laser repeater from Klaus & Werner is well suited for medium-range engagements, but packs a wallop up close.

InstalledItem.Name: Mirai Fury 1xS2 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Mirai
Size: 2
Missiles: 1xS2

To make the Fury a threat despite its small size, Mirai developed this bespoke missile rack, which can carry and deploy one S2 missile without undermining the ship's compact profile.

InstalledItem.Name: Thunderbolt III Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Electromagnetic 
Size: 3

Thanks to the Firestorm Thunderbolt's agile frame and EM targeting system, this proximity missile is a solid choice for a wide variety of combat scenarios.

InstalledItem.Name: Stronghold
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Stronghold shield generator uses patented hull plating techniques to reinforce the generator’s body to make it one of the sturdiest on the market. That means the shield and component are both built to last.

InstalledItem.Name: LuxCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 2
Grade: A 
Class: Competition

Famous for performance that laps the competition, the LuxCore provides all the speed your ship needs. You'll leave other medium power plants in the dust with this first-class component from the racing experts at ACOM.

InstalledItem.Name: LuxCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 2
Grade: A 
Class: Competition

Famous for performance that laps the competition, the LuxCore provides all the speed your ship needs. You'll leave other medium power plants in the dust with this first-class component from the racing experts at ACOM.

InstalledItem.Name: AbsoluteZero
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 2
Grade: B 
Class: Competition

Originally designed for racers, the AbsoluteZero cooler pushes performance to the limits. This high quality component from ACOM features a new coolant cycling system to keep your ship’s systems cool over everything else.
